title: Stratospheric Ozone Essential for Life on Earth

content.question: Stratospheric ozone (<math alttext="O 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>) is essential for life to exist on Earth because it

choices.label: absorbs incoming visible light from the Sun, increasing rates of photosynthesis
reflects incoming visible light from the Sun back into space, increasing rates of cellular respiration

absorbs incoming solar <math alttext="U V C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>UV-C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> radiation, preventing exposure to dangerous radiation from the Sun

reflects incoming solar <math alttext="U V C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>UV-C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> radiation back into space, decreasing the average temperature in terrestrial biomes

content.answer: absorbs incoming solar <math alttext="U V C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>UV-C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> radiation, preventing exposure to dangerous radiation from the Sun

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
